import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Grid, Card, CardHeader, TextField, CardContent } from "@mui/material"; function CreateAnime() { const [values, setValues] = useState({ title: "", episodesWatched: "", episodeCount: "", score: "", synopsis: "", image: "", type: "", status: "", studio: "", }); const [searchAnimeName, setSearchAnimeName] = useState(""); const API_URL = "https://api.jikan.moe/v4"; async function searchAnime(search) { const response = await fetch(`${API_URL}/anime?q=${search}`); const animeData = await response.json(); console.log(animeData.data[0]); setValues({ ...values, title: animeData.data[0].title_english, episodeCount: animeData.data[0].episodes, synopsis: animeData.data[0].synopsis, image: animeData.data[0].images.jpg.image_url, type: animeData.data[0].type, studio: animeData.data[0].studios[0].name, }); } const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSearchSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (searchAnimeName === "") { } else { searchAnime(searchAnimeName); } }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:8081/anime", values) .then((res) => { console.log(res); navigate("/animeList"); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; return (
setSearchAnimeName(e.target.value)} >
setValues({ ...values, title: e.target.value }) } />
setValues({ ...values, episodesWatched: e.target.value, }) } />
setValues({ ...values, episodeCount: e.target.value }) } />
setValues({ ...values, studio: e.target.value }) } />
setValues({ ...values, synopsis: e.target.value }) } />
setValues({ ...values, image: e.target.value }) } />
{" "} Back
); } export default CreateAnime;
